oai_dc:dc.dc:title: Reactivity of cis-bis(acetylacetonato)dichlorotitanium(IV) towards hydroxy-containing ligands: isolation and characterisation of products
oai_dc:dc.dc:creator: RAO, PV
RAO, CP
WEGELIUS, EK
KOLEHMAINEN, E
RISSANEN, K
oai_dc:dc.dc:subject: vanadium(v) complexes
molecular-structure
carboxylic-acids
derivatives
salicylaldehyde
crystal
base
monooxovanadium(v)
electrochemistry
spectroscopy
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: The reactivity of cis-[Ti(acac)(2)Cl-2] with a number of OH containing ligands has been explored. Corresponding products have been synthesized, isolated and characterised. Three dimensional structures of some of the products were established by single crystal X-ray diffraction. The reactivity of these ligands towards non-oxo titanium centres has been found to be different from that of oxometal centres of V-V, Mo-VI and U-VI. All the products of Ti-IV isolated were mononuclear complexes possessing one or two ligands. Both the molecular and crystal structures of the titanium products are found to be different from those of the oxometal ones.
oai_dc:dc.dc:identifier: JOURNAL OF THE CHEMICAL SOCIETY-DALTON TRANSACTIONS, (24), 4469-4474
